results.title: Thrombotic microangiopathy as a complication in a patient with focal segmental glomerulosclerosis.
results.text_hl: She was twice treated with oral @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@cyclophosphamide@@@ and received antihypertensive treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@.

citations.NLM: Benz K, Amann K, Dittrich K, Dötsch J. Thrombotic microangiopathy as a complication in a patient with focal segmental glomerulosclerosis. Pediatr Nephrol. 2007 Dec;22(12):2125-8. PMID: 17882457
